metadata.name: Accessory Pack 1 #1
metadata.description:
ðŸ¤– Metashima - Lightning Accessories ðŸ§°

Obsidian Robotics created a series of DNA symbols, inherited from the Obsidian Cell. Each symbol can be linked to an accessory with hidden power and utility.

Introducing fully-loaded accessories designed and built for Metashima Lightning.

The first pack includes eight accessory DNA types, each type comes with its own unique power and ability. Attach it to your Metashima Lightning to join the starting point of Obsidian Robotics customisation, as we gear up for battle.

[https://metashima.com/](https://www.metashima.com)
